DataElement.preferredName: RT Structure ROI Generation Algorithm 64 Character Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: User-defined description of technique used to generate ROI.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: RT Structure Region of Interest Generation Algorithm
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Treatment of a disease by means of exposure of the target or the whole body to radiation. Radiation therapy is often used as part of curative therapy and occasionally as a component of palliative treatment for cancer. Other uses include total body irradiation prior to transplantation._The components and their relationship and manner of arrangement in constituting a whole._A specific area of interest defined by a sequence of image overlays or a sequence of contours described as a single point (for a point ROI) or more than one point (representing an open or closed polygon)._The act of bringing into being._A defined procedure for solving a problem.  Applied to a problem-solving procedure implemented in software to be executed by a computer.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Treatment of a disease by means of exposure of the target or the whole body to radiation. Radiation therapy is often used as part of curative therapy and occasionally as a component of palliative treatment for cancer. Other uses include total body irradiation prior to transplantation.:The components and their relationship and manner of arrangement in constituting a whole.

Concepts.definition: Treatment of a disease by means of exposure of the target or the whole body to radiation. Radiation therapy is often used as part of curative therapy and occasionally as a component of palliative treatment for cancer. Other uses include total body irradiation prior to transplantation.
The components and their relationship and manner of arrangement in constituting a whole.

Property.preferredName: Imaging Region of Interest Generation Algorithm
Property.preferredDefinition: A specific area of interest defined by a sequence of image overlays or a sequence of contours described as a single point (for a point ROI) or more than one point (representing an open or closed polygon).:The act of bringing into being.:A defined procedure for solving a problem.  Applied to a problem-solving procedure implemented in software to be executed by a computer.

Concepts.definition: A specific area of interest defined by a sequence of image overlays or a sequence of contours described as a single point (for a point ROI) or more than one point (representing and open or closed polygon).
The act of bringing into being.
A defined procedure for solving a problem. Applied to a problem-solving procedure implemented in software to be executed by a computer.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: LO: A 64-character string with leading or trailing spaces being non-significant; NO CONTROL characters. [Standard-based]

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An expression consisting of a linear sequence of symbols (characters or words or phrases).:Text; the words of something written.

Concepts.definition: An expression consisting of a linear sequence of symbols (characters or words or phrases).
